name: classic-asp-formatter
description: A comprehensive formatter for Classic ASP files with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and VBScript support.

enumDescriptions: Format keywords in lowercase (if, then, end if, dim)
Format keywords in UPPERCASE (IF, THEN, END IF, DIM)
Format keywords in PascalCase (If, Then, End If, Dim)
aspFormatter.keywordCase.description: Choose how VBScript keywords should be formatted. Note: ASP objects (Response, Request, etc.) are always formatted in PascalCase.

aspFormatter.indentStyle.description: Choose between spaces or tabs for indentation

aspFormatter.indentSize.description: Number of spaces per indentation level (only applies when using spaces)

aspFormatter.prettier.printWidth.description: Prettier Setting: Maximum line length for HTML/CSS/JS code

aspFormatter.prettier.tabWidth.description: Prettier Setting: Number of spaces per indentation level for HTML/CSS/JS code

aspFormatter.prettier.useTabs.description: Prettier Setting: Use tabs instead of spaces for HTML/CSS/JS code

aspFormatter.prettier.semi.description: Prettier Setting: Add semicolons at the end of JavaScript statements

aspFormatter.prettier.singleQuote.description: Prettier Setting: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JavaScript

aspFormatter.prettier.htmlWhitespaceSens.description: Prettier Setting: How to handle whitespace in HTML

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
